comments: He is very opinionative about certain things. If you opppose his beliefs, your papers will not result in good grades leaving you with a poor grade in the class. Do not take him.

The material of this course is extremely boring no matter what professor (So I\'ve been told).. but this guy is beyond boring, unorganized, gives no instructions for papers,and lectures for the entire class time.. don\'t take him, do yourselves a favor.
He is ridiculously biased for his own agenda and opinions to the contrary are just wrong in his eyes. His course content did not meet his own expectations. Cool, funny guy but not a good professor.
All over the place with context. Rarely gives out homework and the midterm and final are take home essays. Very boring class but he means well. Do not take at 8 am.

Hes really cute and pretty funny in a very odd way so its hard to hate him but the amount of work you get and the level of difficulty is just ridiculous for a 100 level class. Hes almost too smart for his own good. He goes off on tangents because his mind is just all over the place and therefor, so is the class. He is also a really harsh grader.

actually not a bad teacher, may come off as condensing at first but actually a pretty lenient guy with due dates and material on essays. no in class tests just take home essays. likes to joke around. not a real history class, he just covers topics he likes. good if you dont like history

ohhhh my god he is soooo hot. he strips his windbreaker in class and reveals his banana rpublic sweater vest and bowtie. has odd obsession with women studies.... probably because hes never seen a woman naked. he likes to talk about his \'girlfriend\' and growing mustaches. he is a pushover and easily manipulated, however he does not teach material.

Much too much reading for a one-hundred level course. He enjoys the sound of his own voice, talking about his own research and more boring topics like women in the 1800?s, bad novels, whaling?Yuck! Yet he?s nice, sometimes funny, a little cute, helpful outside of class, and kind of an easy grader. Also, attendance is not mandatory :)
Boring, digresses, cant understand what hes talking about half the time. bad text book. however attendance isnt mandatory and hes not strict about the readings. MUST PARTICIPATE to get decent grade!
